executable.title: Convert non-DICOM segmentations into DICOM SEG

string-vector.name: inputDICOMImageFileNames
string-vector.label: DICOM images file names
string-vector.description: List of DICOM images that were used for creating the segmentation

string-vector.name: inputSegmentationsFileNames
string-vector.label: Segmentation file names
string-vector.description: File names of the segmentation images

file.name: outputSEGFileName
file.label: SEG file name
file.description: File name of the SEG object that will keep the result.
